thread.section_title: Hotel Chatillon Paris Montparnasse - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Found on short notice, glad we did!
thread.title_full: Found on short notice, glad we did! - Review of Hotel Chatillon Paris Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Shelley M
title: Found on short notice, glad we did!
text: We ended up booking this hotel with very little notice. We had booked an Airbnb that turned out to be awful so at 6pm we had to find a new hotel for the next six days. We found this place and loved it! It was comfortable, clean, and just what we needed. Definitely recommend!
